Name: Hack & Schlitz
About the game: Gameplay Hack & Schlitz is an epic random-generated Arcade-Roguelike game. Starting a run will spawn you in a 2d-Pixelstyle dungeon where you can decide what difficulty the next room has. Higher Difficulty - more score and more coins. Lower Difficulty - more safe and a lower chance of losing a heart Destroy those slimes and show your Highscore in the Steam Leaderboards!
